sentences.english: A common vocabulary or common understanding can help all in communications.
sentences.chinese: 一套公共词汇或共识可以全方位帮助沟通。

sentences.english: The OLC (Omni-directional luminance control ) provides excellent even lighting without glare.
sentences.chinese: 全方位反射，配光均匀，无眩光。

sentences.english: The control of azimuth is a knotty problem in controlling directional well trace.
sentences.chinese: 在定向井轨迹控制中，方位控制是个棘手问题。

sentences.english: Media industrialization is a omni-directional change.
sentences.chinese: 媒体产业化是一次全方位的变革。

sentences.english: Based on this, the bearing-only algorithm of estimating motion-parameter target is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了利用观察器方位序列估计目标运动参数的方法。

sentences.english: Missing Angle represents the meaning is in a position can't gossip corresponding to the room.
sentences.chinese: 缺角所代表的意思是八卦中的某方位无法对应到房间。

sentences.english: Over these past decades, China has transformed itself totally.
sentences.chinese: 在过去的数十年中，中国进行了全方位的改革转型。

sentences.english: The test covers the whole spectrum of ability.
sentences.chinese: 这想测试全方位的检验你的能力。

sentences.english: The upright orientation is also the first step in surface detachment for bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 这种直立的方位也是细菌脱离组织表面的第一步。

sentences.english: On one hand purchaser cannot all-around understanding goods news.
sentences.chinese: 一方面购买者不能全方位了解商品信息。

sentences.english: Take celestial azimuth and find compass error on each watch if the weather is fine.
sentences.chinese: 如天气好，每一班测取天体方位求出罗经差。

sentences.english: Fourthly, to break the blockade from the all-round opening up.
sentences.chinese: 第四，从打破封锁到全方位对外开放。

sentences.english: A long-term view reinforces the impact of market orientation on output indicators (mainly business performance and esprit de corps as conceptualized by Kohli and Jaworski, 1990).
sentences.chinese: 长期的视野加强市场定方位对输出指示器的冲击。

sentences.english: He pauses a moment at the foot of a tree to take his bearings.
sentences.chinese: 他在一棵树下面停了下来，以便判明自己的方位。

sentences.english: A pattern of all-around and multi-level international S&T cooperation has basically taken shape.
sentences.chinese: 一个全方位，多层次的国际科技合作格局已基本成形。
